title: User Registration with Valid Inputs
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using valid email and password and completes onboarding preferences.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter a valid email address and strong password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm registration success notification is shown.
Complete onboarding preference setup.
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard with personalized greeting and preferences applied.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check login succeeds with valid email and password and loads user session correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email and password.
Click the login button.
User is authenticated and navigated to the main dashboard.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login fails gracefully with inappropriate email or password with proper error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input invalid email and/or password.
Click login button.
Verify error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.
No user session is created.

title: Create New Task with Valid Data
description: Verify that users can create a new task with mandatory fields and that the task appears in the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to task creation form.
Enter valid task title, description, priority, and category.
Submit the task form.
Task is added to the task list and visible on the dashboard.

title: Task Creation with Missing Required Fields
description: Check task form validation prevents creation when required fields are missing and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Open task creation form.
Leave required fields (e.g., task title) empty.
Attempt to submit the form.
Validation errors are displayed and task is not created.

title: Edit Existing Task Successfully
description: Verify existing tasks can be edited and changes persist and update in real-time across devices.

steps.description: Select an existing task from the task list.
Modify the task fields (e.g., title, priority).
Submit the updated task form.
Update is reflected immediately in task list and synced across logged-in sessions.

title: Delete a Task and Confirm Removal
description: Ensure users can delete a task and it is removed from all views and synchronized immediately.

steps.description: Locate a task in the task list.
Trigger delete action for the selected task.
Confirm deletion prompt appears.
Confirm deletion.
Task disappears from task list and is removed from backend.

title: Create and Manage Subtasks within a Project
description: Validate that users can add, edit, and complete subtasks within a project and see accurate progress tracking.

steps.description: Open a project card.
Create one or more subtasks with valid data.
Subtasks are listed under the project with correct status.
Mark subtasks as completed.
Project progress bar updates accurately to reflect subtask completion.

title: AI Mentor Check-In Responds Appropriately
description: Test AI Mentor Check-in conversation providing relevant productivity coaching and smart task suggestions.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Mentor Check-In component.
Initiate a check-in conversation.
AI returns contextually relevant coaching advice based on user input.
Smart task suggestions are displayed appropriately.

title: Voice Transcription Creates Accurate Task
description: Validate that voice input is transcribed correctly into a new task and saved properly.

steps.description: Access the voice transcription task creation interface.
Record a voice task input with clear speech.
Voice input is transcribed correctly into text.
Confirm creation of new task with transcribed content.
Task appears in the task list immediately.

title: Activate Emergency Mode and Verify Task Limitations
description: Test Emergency Mode activation limits visible and active tasks per specifications and supports focus during high-pressure periods.

steps.description: Enable Emergency Mode from the selector.
Task list is filtered to curated tasks suitable for emergency mode.
Attempt to add non-emergency tasks.
New non-emergency task creation is restricted or warned.
Complete emergency tasks.
Progress tracking updates correctly and emergency mode can be exited without errors.

title: Offline Support Allows Access and Edits
description: Confirm that mobile and desktop clients retain access to tasks offline and changes synchronize after reconnecting.

steps.description: Start with a logged-in session on mobile device.
Turn off network connectivity.
User can still view cached task list and project data.
Create or edit tasks offline.
Restore network connection.
Offline changes are synchronized to backend and reflected across devices.

title: Real-Time Synchronization Across Devices
description: Ensure that creating, editing, or deleting tasks on one device updates all logged in sessions in real-time without manual refresh.

steps.description: Log in to the application simultaneously on two devices.
Create a new task on device A.
New task appears automatically on device B.
Edit that task on device B.
Changes reflect immediately on device A.
Delete the task from device A.
Task is removed from device B in real-time.

title: Recurring Task Creation and Execution
description: Validate recurring tasks are created properly and reoccur as per selected frequency with system reminders.

steps.description: Create a task with recurring option enabled and set frequency (daily, weekly, monthly).
Task recurs according to schedule.
Complete a recurring task instance.
Next instance of task is scheduled as per recurring definition.

title: Pull-to-Refresh Synchronizes Data on Mobile
description: Check that pull-to-refresh gesture syncs the latest task and project data on mobile without errors.

steps.description: Open the mobile dashboard.
Perform a pull-to-refresh gesture.
Latest data is fetched from backend and UI is updated accordingly.

title: Admin Cleanup All Users Functionality
description: Verify that admin users can trigger cleanup operations on all users and that the operation completes successfully without errors.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user.
Access admin cleanup interface.
Trigger 'Cleanup All Users' operation.
Operation completes successfully with confirmation message.
User data is appropriately cleaned without impacting unrelated data or app functionality.

title: Security and Access Restrictions on User Sessions
description: Ensure unauthorized users cannot access protected routes or data and user sessions expire securely.

steps.description: Attempt to access dashboard and tasks without logging in.
Access is denied and redirect occurs to login page.
Log in and remain inactive until session timeout.
Attempt to perform task operations after session timeout.
User is logged out and redirected with prompt to login again.

title: User Preferences Update Persists Across Sessions
description: Test that changes to user preferences are saved correctly and loaded applied on subsequent logins.

steps.description: Open user preferences panel.
Modify various preferences such as theme, notification settings, and task default categories.
Save preferences and log out.
Log back in with same user.
Previously saved preferences are loaded correctly and UI reflects changes.

title: Pattern Tracking Learns and Suggests Intelligently
description: Verify AI pattern tracking correctly learns user completion patterns and provides contextual task suggestions.

steps.description: Complete a series of tasks over multiple days with identifiable patterns.
Interact with smart task suggestion interface.
System suggests tasks that align with learned user behavior and preferences.
Suggested tasks adapt after changes in user completion habits.

title: Debug Interface Displays Live Application State
description: Check that developer debug interface shows real-time app state, task data, and error logs without compromising user data privacy.

steps.description: Access the debug page as a developer or test user.
Live application state including tasks, user info, and sync status is displayed.
No sensitive user data like passwords is shown.
Trigger controlled errors or state changes and verify debug interface updates accordingly.
